abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would include
            construction of three 500 MW generating units at the Korba
            thermal power station in the State of Madhya Pradesh,
            together with ancillary equipment and related works, and
            about 1,100 circuit km of associated 400 kV transmission
            lines. The major risk is the possibility of slippage in the
            implementation schedule, which could give rise to delayed
            commissioning of plant with consequent loss of revenues.
            Careful coordination and supervision during construction and
            attention to the manufacturers' abilities to meet
            delivery schedules should keep implementation delays to a minimum.
